article.title: Missile Defense Agency Awards Support Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Analytical Services Inc., Huntsville, Ala., was awarded a $157,120,496 indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract. Under this contract, the contractor directly supports all phases of flight and ground testing and is responsible for the development, sustainment and modernization operations of Ballistic Missile Defense System dedicated test data management and data analysis lab infrastructure, test data transfer network connections, distributed operations systems and servers, and other systems. The work will be performed in Huntsville, Ala. The Missile Defense Agency, Huntsville, Ala., is the contracting agency (HQ0147-14-D-0002).
